subject: Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Peter Bromby of Bermuda was the winner in the Star Class regatta of the Bacardi Cup in Biscayne Bay. Bromby and Magnus Liljedahl kept the overall lead with two races to go in the regatta. John VanderMolen and Geoff Ewenson finished runner-up to remain second in the overall standings. bacardi.
